title: Nomani Investment Scam Surges 62% Using AI Deepfake Ads on Social Media
description: The fraudulent investment scheme known as Nomani has witnessed an increase by 62%, according to data from ESET, as campaigns distributing the threat have also expanded beyond Facebook to include other social media platforms, such as YouTube.
